headline: LAS VEGAS SANDS BREAKS GROUND ON NEW ULTRA-LUXURY DEVELOPMENT IN SINGAPORE
summary: Las Vegas Sands (NYSE: LVS) marked a momentous milestone on Tuesday evening with the groundbreaking of its new US$8 billion ultra-luxurious resort and entertainment destination in Singapore, expanding its regional footprint and strengthening its commitment to the Republic's future.

raw.headline: LAS VEGAS SANDS BREAKS GROUND ON NEW ULTRA-LUXURY DEVELOPMENT IN SINGAPORE

headline: Las Vegas Sands makes $8 bn Singapore bet with resort expansion
summary: Casino operator Las Vegas Sands broke ground Tuesday on a new $8 billion project to expand its iconic Marina Bay Sands resort in Singapore, in a major bet on the city-state's tourism market.Patrick Dumont, president and chief operating officer of Las Vegas Sands, said that when the new project is completed, the US firm would have invested "more than US$15 billion" in Singapore since it started operations there in 2010.

raw.headline: Las Vegas Sands makes $8 bn Singapore bet with resort expansion
raw.summary: Casino operator Las Vegas Sands broke ground Tuesday on a new $8 billion project to expand its iconic Marina Bay Sands resort in Singapore, in a major bet on the city-state's tourism market.Patrick Dumont, president and chief operating officer of Las Vegas Sands, said that when the new project is completed, the US firm would have invested "more than US$15 billion" in Singapore since it started operations there in 2010.
